nodes.text: A flier was a type of repulsorlift vehicle. Fliers were common on the planet Coruscant during the Clone Wars.
The comic series Star Wars: Jedi vs. Sith initially denoted these vehicles as "flyers", however the novel, Darth Bane: Path of Destruction and later sources identify these vehicles as "fliers".
Unlike speeder bikes, which typically had a maximum altitude of 10 meters (32 feet), fliers appear to be able to reach much greater heights.
